lex.text: The Acharya Institute of Technology in Mumbai, Karnataka was given the "Technological Campus" status by the All India Council for Technical Education (located in Mumbai). The Acharya Institute offers tennis and the sports governing body is the International Tennis Foundation. Karnataka has the Arabian Sea to its west.
